product_name: MAC - POWDER KISS LIPSTICK 303 Style Shocked/316/916 DEVOTED TO CHILI/314 Mull it over/923 Stay Curious/308 Mandarin O/315 LASTING PASSION/930 Brickthrough - BESTSELLER - Ship From Godwell Hong Kong
description:
M.A.C MAC Powder Kiss Lipstick - BESTSELLER
***Color options***1. DEVOTED TO CHILI - WARM BRICK RED (316 = 916) - 7736025220712. MULL IT OVER - DIRTY PEACH (314) - 7736025220573. STAY CURIOUS - MUTED PINKY RED (923) - 7736025642794. MANDARIN O -  BRIGHT CREAMY SALMON PINK (308) - 7736024343745. LASTING PASSION - CLEAN BRIGHT RED (315) - 7736025220646. Brickthrough (930) - 7736025887947. Style Shocked! (303) - 773602426805
Matte, totally reinvented. Delivering a blur of soft-focus color, this weightless moisture matte lipstick was developed to replicate a backstage technique: blending out edges of matte lipstick for a hazy effect. Its groundbreaking formula contains moisture-coated powder pigments that condition and hydrate lips. The result is the zero-shine look of a matte lipstick with the cushiony, lightweight feel of a balm. Fall for this soft-touch, misty matte kiss of color.

description:
Product information
New matte lipstick is easy to use, soft and long-lasting color that coats lips with a romantic colour. Gives a soft focus look like a soft filter.

Brand: MAC
Product gross weight: 3.00g
Origin: Canada
Properties: Moisturizing, easy to discoloration, skin tone.

Makeup: Matte / Matte

The cream formula is colored without shimmer, matte, saturated on the lips.

Full Description
A new matte lipstick that is easy to use and gives a soft-looking color that coats lips with a romantic finish. Giving a soft-focus look like a soft filter Developed from Mac Artist's Backstage Makeup techniques help lips look blurry while providing moisture and nourishment to lips.Lightweight powder texture Gives results like not using matte lipstick Makes lips look smooth as if makeup from M·A·C Backstage.
Features and benefits
• Provides long-lasting hydrating lips • Provides a lightweight feel • Helps blur the lip grooves and provide a smoother-looking lip effect • Lightweight
Usage"
Apply directly on the lips.
